remarks: An equality deduction for the maps to notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
statement:
mpt2eq123dv.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = D ) $.
mpt2eq123dva.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B = E ) $.
mpt2eq123dva.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> C = F ) $.
mpt2eq123dva $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) = ( x e. D , y e. E |-> F ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph y $.
